DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate phenoxymethylpenicillin ( v-penicillin ) trimethoprim 's possible induction oxidative stress human cell . The induction examine compare change oxidative stress treatment group change placebo group . The study randomized-based placebo-controlled study . Each treatment group consist 30 healthy male volunteer consume either v-penicillins , trimethoprim placebo 7 day . The induction oxidative stress measure 8-oxoguanosine 8-oxodeoxoguanosine , isolated urine . A t-test performed compare drug treatment placebo . The result publish .
